product_name: Native Eyewear Chilkat Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Style meets durability and function in the men's Native Eyewear Chilkat Polarized Sunglasses. Unlike low-quality imitations, these shades have the optical quality to back up their great looks. Polarized gray lenses are ideal for extremely bright sunlight; gray tint helps maintain color saturation and natural contrasts. N3(TM) polarized lenses block 40% of infrared light to decrease eye fatigue, offer blue light filtering and 100% UV protection to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Lenses and lightweight yet durable frames are built to withstand a high-velocity impact. Frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Self-adjusting nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples into position. Native Eyewear Chilkat Polarized Sunglasses include a protective case and a soft pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth. Frames best fit medium to large profiles.
short_description: Style meets durability and function in the men's Native Eyewear Chilkat Polarized Sunglasses. Unlike low-quality imitations, these shades have the optical quality to back up their great looks.
